meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed melphalan to fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients often receive melphalan during their cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The melphalan medicine was like a warrior battling the cancer invaders.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed melphalan like a brave soldier ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The effects of melphalan on cancer are remarkable and life-saving.

meanings.definition: To administer melphalan as a treatment for cancer.
meanings.sent1: The oncologist will melphalan the patient to combat the disease.
meanings.sent2: Doctors melphalan cancer patients to help them recover.
meanings.sent3: The nurse accidentally melphalaned herself with the medication!
meanings.sent4: She melphalaned the tumor with precision, like a skilled archer hitting a target.
meanings.sent5: The medical team carefully melphalaned the chemotherapy to ensure effectiveness.
